'''Martin Odhelius''' is a former web developer who worked at [[Mojang Studios]] from January 2013 to March 2017.<ref>{{tweet|modhelius|289810949471346689}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|modhelius|846332959091314689|Ok, it's official: after over 4 years at Mojang I've decided to leave for new adventures, and this will indeed be my last week at the office|March 27, 2017}}</ref>

== Biography ==
Odhelius is a graduate of the [[wikipedia:Royal Institute of Technology|Royal Institute of Technology]] in mechanical engineering. He began his career at [[wikipedia:Lund University|Lund University]] working as a developer from May 2000 to October 2000. Later at Dotify from October 2000 to December 2004, then at Creuna from February 2005 to December 2012.<ref>http://se.linkedin.com/in/odhelius</ref>
